dict.acceptation: 学习，学会；习得；得知；记住；

sent.orig: Learn young, learn fair, It is never too late to learn. But, More haste speed.
sent.trans: 要学趁年轻，要学既学好，学习永远不会晚，但是，欲速则不达。

sent.orig: Some adult students learn out of books, some learn by doing, some learn best by listening.
sent.trans: 有的成年学生不靠书本学习，有的通过实际操作来学习，还有的靠听课才能学好。

sent.orig: Let kids learn how to learn, and learn how to be excited about things.
sent.trans: 让孩子学习如何学习，学习如何对事情保持兴奋之情。

sent.orig: We should continue to learn from the Soviet Union and know what to learn.
sent.trans: 我们要继续学习苏联，还要会学。

sent.orig: And there's another way to learn to learn English, yes, sing songs.
sent.trans: 其实学英语还有一个很重要的方法，对，唱歌。
